participant_1.background: i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home.

participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

content.text: I am good. how about you? do you like roleplaying? I do
I am fine. I am not really into role-playing myself. But I always wondering about these type of activities. How are you usually play?
I am a veterinarian. do you have any hobbies? I like playing roleplaying
Oh, and I am a doctor, pretty close to what you do. I don't have any hobbies, my daughter take most of my free time.
I like to spend time with my daughter. do you work? I work at home
I don't know that veterinarian can work from home.  I work now, but I am looking for a new job.
what do you do for a living? I am in a veterinarian
And as I say before, I am a doctor. I think you missed it.
I do not have time for that. I have a internet addiction
Time for what? I thought you are really in rolepalying. Or do you mean online RPGs?
I like rpgs. it is my dream. what about you
